TAGS.TITLE: Tags
TAGS.DESCRIPTION: Make your Story more discoverable using tags

SOCIAL.TITLE: Social appearance
SOCIAL.DESCRIPTION: How your Story will appear on social networks

ABOUT.TITLE: What is Story?
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Story is the first-ever article creator that enables editorial teams to break their narratives into engaging particles and deliver an interactive, visually-stunning journey to readers.
ABOUT.STEP_3: Share or instantly embed to your site

ERROR.SAVING_DISABLED: Saving is disabled. Please try again in 5 minutes
ERROR.COVER_UNSUPPORTED_FORMAT: File failed to upload cover image. Try another one!

DELETE_SECTION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this?

CONVO.TITLE_LABEL: Make readers feel as though they are reading someone’s text messages!
CONVO.TEXT_1_LABEL: Choose the template that enables you to upload images for all of the Convo participants.You can add text and images to each message bubble!
CONVO.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Convo template that looks and feels like iOS messenger.
CONVO.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use Convo to create a list or timeline of events. Simply upload a number or date as the image for each “participant”.

EMBED.TEXT_1_LABEL: Embed Google maps to show your readers a specific location.
EMBED.TEXT_2_LABEL: Include any video from Vimeo in your article.
EMBED.TEXT_3_LABEL: Embed Twitter posts to make your content more interesting and engaging.
EMBED.TEXT_4_LABEL: Embed Instagram posts to make your content more visually stunning.

FLIP_CARD.TITLE_LABEL: Surprise your readers by displaying images and text cards that readers can click to flip and reveal the other side.
FLIP_CARD.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use flip-card to reveal something to your readers. Surprise, shock, and entertain them! This is also great for “before and after” comparisons!
FLIP_CARD.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use Flip-card to filter what your readers see. Give them the choice to decide if they want to see adult content or not.

IMAGE.TITLE_LABEL: Add stunning images and make your visuals stand out by adding a blur or zoom-in effect
IMAGE.TEXT_1_LABEL: Surprise your readers by blurring an image. Clicking to reveal the image gives them an interactive and engaging content experience!
IMAGE.TEXT_2_LABEL: Draw your readers' attention to the focal point of an image using the Zoom filter.
IMAGE.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the blur effect to give readers the choice to decide if they want to see graphic content or not.

PARAGRAPH.TITLE_LABEL: Use text to form the base for your Story.
PARAGRAPH.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use the text marker to highlight the most important parts in your text.
PARAGRAPH.TEXT_2_LABEL: Your reader's’ eye will immediately be drawn to the highlighted text. Make sure to highlight the important parts that they need to read.
PARAGRAPH.TEXT_3_LABEL: Include emojis and hyperlinks to make your text more interactive and interesting!

POLL.TITLE_LABEL: Polls allow readers to express their opinion and respond to the content you create.
POLL.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use a poll to getting your readers involved. Give them a chance to throw in their 2 cents! For example, asking what they think about something on social media.
POLL.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use a cover image for your Poll to make your question more visual and exciting.
POLL.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use a background image and choose the Grid template to create a visually awesome poll that is fun to interact with!
POLL.TEXT_4_LABEL: Remember to always include a “none of the above” option to give your readers an easy out if none of the options suit them.

QUOTE.TITLE_LABEL: Highlight words of wisdom by creating a designed quote.
QUOTE.TEXT_1_LABEL: Short and sweet; keep your quotes to the point and easy to read.
QUOTE.TEXT_2_LABEL: Include an image of who said it next to the quote to give your readers context and more information.

SUMMARY.TITLE_LABEL: In the age of TL;DR, Summary gets straight to the point and give readers only the information they need. They can be used in different ways...
SUMMARY.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use Summary to wrap-up the main points of any topic. Give your audience the big picture in a series of succinct points. Include a cover image to tie the Summary into the topic of your article.
SUMMARY.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Summary template for recipes to include a sidebar for ingredients. Include a beautiful visual to make your Summary more interesting.
SUMMARY.TEXT_3_LABEL: Use the check-box feature to create a to-do list using Summary.

VIDEO_CREATOR.TITLE_LABEL: Incorporate video in a more flexible and low-cost manner. Simply customize our readymade templates, choose a color palette and add the right sound.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use the classic template to create a video list with GIFs and images.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use the Vs. template to compare and contrast a topic that your readers care about.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_3_LABEL: Every screen in the Vs. template will compare a subtopic under the larger comparison with text, images and GIFs!
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_4_LABEL: Use the Facts template to list facts about something important to your readers.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_5_LABEL: Each slide in a Facts video has large text over a background image.
VIDEO_CREATOR.TEXT_6_LABEL: Use the Swift template to create a quicker video with a an intro screen that automatically pulls visuals from all of your video’s slides.

VIDEO_PLAYER.TEXT_1_LABEL: Use any video on Vimeo to make your article more interesting.
VIDEO_PLAYER.TEXT_2_LABEL: Use any video on Youtube to make your article more interesting.
